pages.text: Chaining Attack will cause your attacks to jump to additional enemies, up to the listed Chaining.$(br2)Each time the attack jumps, the damage is cut in half.$(br2)Example :$(br)   Main Attack : 100 damage$(br)   Chain 1 : 50 damage $(br)   Chain 2 : 25 damage$(br)   Chain 3 : 12 damage.$(br2)This Magnet Prefix is only found as an Unusual modifier.
